item.title: alert
item.description: The alert shortcode allow you to highlight information in your page. They create a colored box surrounding your text, like this: role="alert">This is an alert ! Usage Parameter Default Description theme info success, info,warning,danger role="alert"> Tips : setting only the theme as argument works too : {{%alert warning%}} instead of {{%alert theme="warning"%}} Basic examples {{% alert theme="info" %}}**this** is a text{{% /alert %}} {{% alert theme="success" %}}**Yeahhh !

item.title: attachments
item.description: The Attachments shortcode displays a list of files attached to a page. Example : role="alert"> Attachments <li> <a href="//guidelines/shortcodes/attachments.files/BachGavotteShort.mp3" > BachGavotteShort.mp3 </a> (357 kB) </li> <li> <a href="//guidelines/shortcodes/attachments.files/Carroll_AliceAuPaysDesMerveilles.pdf" > Carroll_AliceAuPaysDesMerveilles.pdf </a> (175 kB) </li> <li> <a href="//guidelines/shortcodes/attachments.files/adivorciarsetoca00cape.pdf" > adivorciarsetoca00cape.pdf </a> (361 kB) </li> <li> <a href="//guidelines/shortcodes/attachments.files/hugo.png" > hugo.png </a> (17 kB) </li> <li> <a href="//guidelines/shortcodes/attachments.files/movieselectricsheep-flock-244-32500-2.mp4" > movieselectricsheep-flock-244-32500-2.mp4 </a> (340 kB) </li> Usage The shortcurt lists files found in a specific folder.

item.title: notice
item.description: The notice shortcode shows 4 types of disclaimers to help you structure your page. item.title: panel
item.description: The panel shortcode Allow you to highlight information or put it in a box. They create a colored box surrounding your text Usage Parameter Default Description header none The title of the panel. If specified, this title will be displayed in its own header row. footer none the footer of the panel.
